eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.tools

Class JsonToRdf

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.tools.JsonToRdf

  • public class JsonToRdf
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entry point of the utility for extracting RDF triples from JSON documents. LIMITATIONS: The entire JSON document is read in memory before parsing, so large files require suitable configuration of the JVM heap size.
    Version:
    1.8
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonToRdf

        public JsonToRdf(Configuration config,
                 Classification classific,
                 java.lang.String inFile,
                 java.lang.String outFile,
                 int sourceSRID,
                 int targetSRID)
          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructor for the transformation process from JSON document to RDF.
        Parameters:
        config - Parameters to configure the transformation.
        classific - Instantiation of the classification scheme that assigns categories to input features.
        inFile - Path to input JSON file.
        outFile - Path to the output file that collects RDF triples.
        sourceSRID - Spatial reference system (EPSG code) of the input JSON file.
        targetSRID - Spatial reference system (EPSG code) of geometries in the output RDF triples.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Applies transformation according to the configuration settings.

      • parseObjectNode

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseObjectNode(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode)
        Parses and possibly flattens a JSON object node.
        Parameters:
        jsonNode - The JSON node to be parsed.
        Returns:
        A map with (flattened) properties as keys and their respective values as identified in the given JSON node.

      • parseNestedArrayNode

        private void parseNestedArrayNode(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> record,
                                  java.lang.String key,
                                  int k,
                                  com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode)
        Parses and possibly flattens a JSON properties node (i.e., properties listed as distinct items in an array).
        Parameters:
        record - A map updated with (flattened) properties as keys and their respective values as identified in the given JSON node.
        key - The name of the parent property.
        k - The serial number of the item in the underlying array.
        jsonNode - The JSON node to be parsed.

      • parseNestedArray

        private void parseNestedArray(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> record,
                              java.lang.String key,
                              com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode arrayNode)
        Handles a nested array of properties under an identified object (feature), by essentially parsing each of them.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the parent property.
        arrayNode - A JSON node representing an array of children nodes.

      • parseArrayNode

        private void parseArrayNode(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode arrayNode)
        Parses an array of object nodes, by invoking processing for each of them.
        Parameters:
        arrayNode - The parent node representing an array of object nodes.

      • flattener

        private void flattener(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> record,
                       java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> node,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> names)
        Flattens any nested properties in the given JSON node.
        Parameters:
        record - Map structure to collect the flattened properties (keys) and their values.
        node - JSON node to be flattened.
        names - Prefix names for the keys to be generated.

      • processRecord

        private void processRecord(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> record)
        Submit a single feature (with a geometry and all its non-spatial properties) for transformation.
        Parameters:
        record - Map structure that has collected all flattened properties (as keys) and their respective values.

      • parseDocument

        private void parseDocument(byte[] json)
        Parse each item in the input JSON document in order to create the necessary triples (including geometric and non-spatial attributes).
        Parameters:
        json - The JSON document having (maybe nested) properties per item.
